features.name: lvef_percent
features.description: Left ventricular ejection fraction percentage if explicitly reported.
features.prompt: Prefer the explicitly stated numeric EF percentage. Do not infer from words alone.

features.name: lv_systolic_dysfunction_grade
features.prompt: Map textual severity statements to one allowed value. If conflicting, use the final impression.

features.name: diastolic_dysfunction_grade
features.prompt: Capture explicit grade only; if diastolic dysfunction mentioned without grade, use indeterminate.

features.name: aortic_stenosis_severity
features.prompt: Differentiate aortic sclerosis from true stenosis; use sclerosis_only when explicitly stated.

features.name: mitral_regurgitation_severity
features.prompt: Use valve-specific wording only for mitral regurgitation.

features.name: tricuspid_regurgitation_severity
features.prompt: Use valve-specific wording only for tricuspid regurgitation.

features.name: rv_function
features.prompt: Map phrases like mildly/moderately/severely reduced RV systolic function to allowed values.

features.name: pulmonary_hypertension_mention
features.description: Whether pulmonary hypertension is explicitly stated.
features.prompt: Set yes only if pulmonary hypertension is explicitly named.

features.name: estimated_rvsp_mmHg
features.description: Estimated right ventricular systolic pressure in mmHg, if provided.
features.prompt: Extract RVSP only when numeric value and units are clearly reported.

features.name: pericardial_effusion
features.prompt: Capture explicit pericardial effusion severity; tamponade only if clearly documented.
